answers.answer: So sorry your feeling poorly, I've had a headache last 3 days it's only just gone today, I left the house for a while and had some fresh air ,I also went for a massage to relieve some tenson and at the moment seems to have worked, hope u feel better x

Every test for preeclampsia came back negative-I have had 2 different prescription meds called in for headache, and neither of them worked! So now i have to go see a neurologistUgh everything has been fine health wise until last week!

question: I have had a head ache since Thursday that nothing will even ease, also since Thursday i have been to the dr 3 times and now at the er for the 2nd time bc of my blood pressure and swelling and head ache.... Ugh! Just shoot me!
title: somebody help me!
